description: With over 20 years of experience, especially in urology, renal transplantation, robotic surgery, and uro-oncology, Dr. Pragnesh Desai is the Principal Consultant at Max Super Speciality Hospital in Saket, New Delhi. Considering his long experience in surgery and for his patient care, he stands forward as one of the talented surgeons around in his specialty. What he excelled at most was in the domain of renal transplants and advanced procedures of robotic surgery.

list.content: Principal Consultant, Dept. of Urology, Robotics, Renal Transplant & Uro-Oncology, Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, New Delhi (Mar 2019-To Date)
Consultant, Dept. of Urology, Robotics, Renal Transplant & Uro-Oncology, Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, New Delhi, since March 2019.
Associate Consultant at Dept. of Urology, Robotics, Renal Transplant & Uro-Oncology Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, New Delhi Aug 2018 to Feb 2019
Consultant to Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, New Delhi, worked in the Dept. of Urology, Robotics, Renal Transplant, & Uro-Oncology from Jan 2017 to July 2018.
Junior Consultant–Urology & Renal Transplant PSRI Hospital, Sheikh Sarai, New Delhi Jan 2016-Dec 2016
M. Ch., Sr. Resident, Deptt. of Urology and Robotic Surgery, AIIMS, New Delhi (Jan 2013–Dec 2015)
Senior Resident, Dept. of General Surgery, Safdarjung Hospital, New Delhi, India Oct 2009 –Sept 2012
Resident DNB: Dept. of General Surgery, Safdarjung Hospital (SJH), New Delhi (Jan 2006-Dec 2009).
M. Ch. in Urology, AIIMS, New Delhi
DNB in Surgery, New Delhi, Safdarjung Hospital
